episodes.title: How to Recognize If You're Being Influenced by a Narcissist
episodes.description: Many of us have encountered a narcissist—at work, in life, or in our own families. But many of us are not prepared to deal with the traumatic psychological and destructive toll narcissists can cause. Guest Dan Shaw is a social worker, psychoanalyst, and the author of an illuminating new book called Traumatic Narcissism: Relational Systems of Subjugation. He talks about how his own experience in a cult with a charismatic leader led him to pursue a psychology career. Then he sheds light on narcissistic personality disorder, sharing suggestions on how to reprogram those who have been adversely affected.
